name: Dread...
description:
There was once a boy, who faced abuse from each side.

As a small teddy bear, it is him you must guide.

His sister was mean, his classmates were cruel.

You must help the boy, by using each tool.

There is something else, in his awful dreams.

You must fend from it, or you'll hear the boy's screams...

Made by GiantMarble (Yes, the guy on Youtube)

Note that there are two endings, and a few secrets.

Certain parts of this game were inspired, such as the movement(Happy Hill's Homicide) or the ascension(Binding of Isaac).
